p: Formalin‐fixed, paraffin‐embedded tissue sections were obtained from all cases. Sufficient tissues for immunohistochemical analysis could not be obtained from two cases. As a result, 11 tissue samples were analyzed in total (Table 2). Ten cases were found to be intact and one case was found to be deficient (Figure 3A,B). The deficient case had a primary liver NEC with multiple liver metastases and temporarily achieved a partial response (Figure 3C,D).
